Texto: 
none provided
radiotherapy
large mass consistent with lymphoma in right axilla, some nodal involvement medial to the mass. no other masses evident.
non-hodgkin&#8217;s lymphoma. (presumed previous biopsy)
patient has known non-hodgkin&#8217;s lymphoma
44 y/o male with known history of lymphoma presents for pet to evaluate for staging.
